data: “Urei” was what they called the huge Unified Reflexive Electronic Integrator, and the vast machine seemed to be developing a personality of its own.
"Urei" was what they called the huge Unified Reflexive Electronic Integrator, and the vast machine seemed to be developing a personality of its own.
